categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Bant Eerin was a female Mon Calamari Jedi Master who served in the Jedi Order during the last decades of the Galactic Republic. She was one of Obi-Wan Kenobi's oldest friends at the Jedi Temple on Coruscant. She was involved in a test for Kenobi and his Padawan, Anakin Skywalker.
